actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Government Reorganization Act to repeal the limitation on the council of the District of Columbia regarding the imposition of any tax upon individuals who are not residents of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Government Reorganization Act to repeal the provision that prohibits the Council of the District of Columbia from imposing a tax upon individuals who are not residents of the District.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Government Reorganization Act to repeal the limitation on the council of the District of Columbia regarding the imposition of any tax upon individuals who are not residents of the District of Columbia.
